imdb.title: Tenshi no 3P!
imdb.plot: Kyo Nukui is a teenager who refuses to go to school, and spends his days composing songs and publishing them online. One day, he is approached by a trio of orphaned little girls who ask for his help to hold a performance at the ch...

episodes.title: Heart Throbbing for Elementary School Kids!
episodes.plot: Kyou Nukui is a shut-in high schooler with a love for music, often posting his music online under the fake name of HibikiP. One day, an anonymous sender wants to meet him at a park, to which Kyou agrees, thinking it to be a middle-aged man interested in discussing music like him. However, the anonymous sender turns out to be three elementary school girls Jun Gotou, Nozomi Momijidani, and Sora Kaneshiro, who request that he play his music with their band in an upcoming concert.

episodes.title: A Desire to Do It Together
episodes.plot: Kyou agrees to help the girls with the concert, but Masayoshi Sawatari, the head of the orphanage where they live, asks him to dissuade them.

episodes.title: The Boy on Hiatus Descends and Flees, and the Girls from the Church
episodes.plot: Kyou discovers that Jun and the others are classmates of his younger sister Kurumi, but for some reason do not get along well with the other kids at school.

episodes.title: The World is but Rock n' Roll
episodes.plot: Kyou and the girls have no success at all to gather attendants to the concert, and he then decides to return to school and ask for his classmates' help, while suggesting the girls to do the same at theirs.

episodes.title: It's so Fun Taking Pictures of You, Because You Don't Realize How Cute You Are
episodes.plot: The concert is a success, and Kyou and the girls' next step is to gather more public to make a steady income from their gigs. By suggestion of a friend, Kyou decides to make a PV of them for advertising.

episodes.title: Don't Take the Bassist!
episodes.plot: Nozomi meets her grandfather, who wants to adopt her and take her to England.

episodes.title: Surprise Invitation
episodes.plot: Kyou is invited along the girls of Lien de Famille by his online friend Yuzuha Aigae to hold a concert on a resort island.

episodes.title: The Girl in the Mural
episodes.plot: Uneasy with Kyou's closeness with the girls, Yuzuha comes with several ploys against them.

episodes.title: The Grade School Kids Might've Not Been Able to Save the Drowning God if They Hadn't Gotten There in Time
episodes.plot: Kyou discovers that his online friend was not Yuzuha, but Kiryu Yume, and Yuzuha was acting in her stead.

episodes.title: Totally a Date
episodes.plot: Kiryu and Yuzuha gain permission to leave the island and transfer to the local school.

episodes.title: Band Battles and Melodies
episodes.plot: Enraged with how much time Kyou spends with the girls of Lien de Famille, Kiryu decides to form her own act with Yuzuha and Kurumi's help and challenge them to a duel. In the occasion, Jun expresses her wish to write a music of her own, and Kyou agrees to help her with it.

episodes.title: Can't Help but Love the Music
episodes.plot: After finishing their preparations, the time has come for Lien de Famille and Kiryu's band to perform together.
